name: Snow Warning
short-desc: Summons hail that lasts indefinitely upon entering battle.
long-desc: The weather changes to hail when this Pokemon enters battle and does not end unless cancelled by another weather condition.  If multiple Pokemon with this ability, , , or  are sent out at the same time, the abilities will activate in order of Speed, respecting .  Each ability's weather will cancel the previous weather, and only the weather summoned by the slowest of the Pokemon will stay.
